pages.title: The Plague
pages.text: $(li)The Plague inflicts a little more damage than the $(l:patchouli:weapons/end_crystal_bow)End Crystal Bow$(/l).$(br)$(li)When an arrow fired by this crossbow hits a creature, it will inflict it the Wither effect damaging it for a few seconds.

pages.name: The Plague
pages.text: This weapon doesn't have durability and can't be burned by lava or fire.
